title: Will we get new stories for the Void Creatures?
body: Title. The Void is a fascinating and terrifying thing, and with Kai'sa's release I imagined we would be getting a lot more lore not only about Malzahar and Kassadin, but also the dark things that crept from the Void and into the world. We got some really cool art, but not much in terms of the tales surrounding the Void creatures themselves. Is Kai'Sa actively hunting any of them? Are Rengar or Nami? Is Vel'Koz still on a mission to analyze Runeterran lifeforms? There still seems to be a lot of untapped territory from a narrative standpoint, and with no Void champion planned to be released any time soon one has to wonder when we'll next hear about any of the characters related to it. Anything to look forward to in the near-future Riot?

replies.body:

>
> Yes.

Is there an estimate here? If the yes is in two years then I don't know.

Koggers got a new short-lore, which I thought was pretty great.

But they probably aren't going to be getting updates until one (or both!) of them get a VGU.  This update focused on the human side of the Void.
{{champion:31}} and {{champion:96}} are high priority for full VGU, so I guess we will   have to wait a bit

> Will we get new stories for the Void Creatures?

The answers is yes, but only in the sense of _eventually_. But that "eventually" is unpredictable...

So who knows, 7-8 months from now anything is possible.
